item.title: TGTX
item.description: score:343 Chances: TG Therapeutics, Inc. has entered into an agreement to acquire a worldwide license to Precision BioSciences, Inc.’s Azercabtagene Zapreleucel (azer-cel), an allogeneic CD19 CAR T cell therapy program for autoimmune diseases. The average of price targets set by Wall Street analysts indicates a potential upside of 127.

item.title: KSS
item.description: score:20 Chances: Kohl’s shares jumped 7.3% in solidarity with Macy’s after an investor group made a $5.8 billion offer to take Macy’s private Risks: The retail industry is facing challenges such as stiff competition from online rivals and high inflation Score:20 chances characters count - risks characters count = -980
